Reviews.Content: Not the most convenient location... Although listed as a 5 star hotel, I would peg this hotel as more of a 3.5 star to 4 star hotel. A little tired and frayed on the edges in some places. The Huandao Boya is located right off of the Wanshoulu metro stop (line 1 of the Beijing metro) but is several stops away from the Forbidden City so this is not the most convenient hotel. If a central / convenient location is important, I would consider other hotels in the Beijing area. We stayed at this hotel as part of a packaged tour so my guess is that the rates at this place are less than the competition.
Reviews.Author: derekk2007
